name: Jumpback
description:
Save your spot anywhere within your file then with a click of a button you can Jumpback.


STEP-BY-STEP

1. SAVE Current Spot

2. JUMP to Saved Spot

3. CLEAR Saved Spot (to make way for a new one)


USE CASE EXAMPLE

Joe is working on the latest update to the home screen for an app. He sees Jenny’s cursor come over, “Hey Joe, come take a look at something.”Joe wants to help her out, so he follows her over where she’s been doing updates on the Settings screen. He spends 10 minutes giving his feedback, but now he's ready to get back over to where he was working.The problem is, there’s multiple pages in this file, and 100+ screens... where was he?! Jumpback

 plugin to the rescue!


This plugin was built with love by the @unfold team - check out our other plugins and what we do!
